Changed WWW home page

  • To: Multiple recipients of list <ics1c@UCI.EDU>
  • Subject: Changed WWW home page
  • From: ICS 1C Instructional Staff <ics1c@ics.uci.edu>
  • Date: Mon, 30 Jan 1995 16:49:22 -0800 
Class accounts on EA are now set so that Mosaic and Lynx start up
with the ICS 1C Home Page unless you select otherwise or unless
you start them from the Menu.
-- sdf
S D Franklin
ICS 1C Instructor
